movie1.title: A Sunday in Hell
movie1.description: The film follows the French Paris-Roubaix spring classic, notorious for the hellish paves or cobbled roads of the north, which are no longer used for traffic but only for transporting,

movie2.title: Reptilicus
movie2.description: After copper miners discover part of the frozen tail of a prehistoric monster in Lapland, scientists inadvertently bring it back to life

movie3.title: The Live
movie3.description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that allow him to wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over the Earth.

movie4.title: Pi
movie4.description: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

movie5.title: Groundhog Day
movie5.description: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

movie6.title: Trading Places
movie6.description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

movie7.title: Brazil
movie7.description: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error, and becomes an enemy of the state.
